Posts.EditableText: I'm trying to get rid of the horizontal scroll bar at the bottom of my game, but the only way I can do this is to reduce my game width. However, when I do this, I end up with white margins either side of my game area. Is there any way to set the colour of the game borders?

Posts.EditableText:
I think the background image would only go as far as the borders anyway, but as it happens I fixed the issue literally a few minutes ago.

All I wanted to do was remove the horizontal scroll bar from the bottom of the screen, so I added [b:17xg5vqw]overflow-x: hidden[/b:17xg5vqw] to the CSS body and it's now gone.
